    "name": "Primes of the form 3n^2 + 2.",
    "comment": [
        "Two together with A027864(n).",
        "Generated by n = 0, 1, 3, 7, 13, 15, 25, 35, 53, 57, ..."
    ],
    "example": [
        "2 is in this sequence because 3*0^2 + 2 = 2 and 2 is prime."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Select[Table[3 n^2 + 2, {n, 0, 400}], PrimeQ] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 17 2015 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(MAGMA) [a: n in [0..400] | IsPrime(a) where a is (3*n^2+2)];",
        "(PARI) select(isprime, vector(100, n, 3*n^2-6*n+5)) \\\\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 17 2015"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A103564, A027864. Primes of the form k*n^2 + k - 1: A090698, this sequence, A121825, A201483, A201600, A201607, A201704."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,easy",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "_Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Apr 16 2015",
    "references": 1,
    "revision": 16,
    "time": "2015-04-19T20:44:18-04:00",
